entry.title: jasmine-headless-webkit
entry.content:
this isn't supposed to be a technical blog.
oh well, forget it.

quick and dirty note

  1. gem install jasmine jasmine-headless-webkit guard-jasmine-headless-webkit
  2. sudo apt-get install libqt4-dev libqtwebkit-dev
  3. jasmine init # setup example spec files
  4. jasmine-headless-webkit # build the runner and run the tests
  5. guard init jasmine-headless-webkit # create Guardfile

install https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/150/message-notifier/ to quickly get rid of piled up notify-send notifications (in gnome3 with gnome-shell)
